thread.title: DOT To Widen Turn Lane

author: KWBG
title: DOT To Widen Turn Lane
text:
DOT To Widen Turn Lane Posted on 24 October 2015 by KWBG 
BOONE, Iowa—The Iowa Department of Transportation has worked planned in Boone County Monday and it will affect traffic. The work will be done at US Highway 30 and Corporal Snedden Drive. Local traffic that accesses US Highway 30 or Exits 30 at Snedden Drive will be affected. Monday’s closure is planned for 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Several road closed signs will be set up in the community and traffic will be warned by electronic message board at US Highway 30 and Highway 17 and US Highway 30 and South Story Street.
